entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET November 2024 Updates #335
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43498 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #334
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43499 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #333
  • .NET 9 #332

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • First class span's break EFC #109757
  • JsonPolymorphic with JsonDerivedType cannot be serialized / deserialized with System.Text.Json #109755
  • NET 9 Regression: Razor Source Generator False IL2111 Warning with DynamicComponent #109752
  • ILLink: Don't mark fields and properties when only assigned default value and other accesses are null-checked #109748
  • VisualStudio Version 17.13.0 Preview 1.0 still want to install .Net 9 RC2 on WSL/Unbuntu #109747
  • JIT: libraries jitstress Assertion failed 'doesVNMatch' during 'Assertion prop' #109745
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 can not be installed on older macOS #109750
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43498 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #109740
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43499 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #109738
  • Testing of packages and installers and related infra #109736
  • JIT: libraries jitstress AV failures #109730
    10.0.0
  • .NET 8 performance issue with IBMMQDotnetClient (v9.3 & v9.4) #109729
  • Add camelCase option to the JSON console log formatter #109726
    Future
  • Document profiling.md missmatch with code #109722
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove<String> #109734
  • Metadata blob is too large, exceeding 16MB #109720
  • RuntimeInstanceNotAllowed Error Initializing XmlSerializer on Android Release Build in .NET 9 #109724
  • [NativeAOT] export for android cannot work #109713
  • Diagnostics eventcommand argument error when run generic host on netframework #109712

Closed

  • ReadOnlySequence<byte>.PositionOf Error #102457
    Future
  • Allowing SortedDictionary.Remove while enumerating #108374
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_BoostDocs_Simple #109735
    10.0.0
  • It is not possible to pass the ID of the garbage collection when the .NET provider is enabled with the GCHeapCollect(0x800000) keyword #102572
    10.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException when using one-shot AES decrypt with empty array #109658
    10.0.0
  • Document support for released app diagnostics with NativeAOT on iOS #106799
    9.0.0
  • Missing risc-v implementations in mono mini #74071
    9.0.0
  • The same code pinvoke will not generate. dmp in. net8, but it will generate. dmp in. net4.7.2 #109402
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: error IL1012: IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error. #109640
    10.0.0
  • [cdacreader] Simplify build order and dependencies #104158
    Future
  • NetBSD buildslave? #5102

PullRequests

Created

  • Support building the repo with clang 20 #109756
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove .NET Framework-era remoteable wait subsystem #109754
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch #109753
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors. #109749
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #109744
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #109743
    linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #109742
    area-codeflow
  • JIT: Optimize for cost instead of score in 3-opt layout #109741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109731
    area-System.Security
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Use ABI names for floating registers #109728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [ppc64le] Fixed System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests failures #109725
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109723
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • Only build cdac-build-tool when we need to build runtime #109719
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Propagate delegate loads during inlining #109715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix inliner profile consistency computation #109714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Reference ILVerification projects from ILLink solutions #109718
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix message when no DAM members match #109717
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add AggressiveInlining to type checks in SearchValues<string> #109737
    area-System.Buffers, 10.0.0
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Define a DllMain for native AOT shared libraries #109699
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add dllmain to PlatformManifestEntry #109733
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • extend xml docs with OverflowException information #109645
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 10.0.0
  • Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #105456
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Check input length for empty when decrypting with padding #109660
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.116, windows: 131.0.6778.33 #109678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Remove CoreCLR PAL's InternalNew/Delete and just use new/delete with std::nothrow #109659
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Pass BaseOS property down to the inner build as well #109705
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix for `MissingTestException` #109577
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix AOT warning in System.Linq.Expressions #109758
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger bitwise operators on certain negative numbers #109684
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109706
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109709
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.x
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [ILASM] Add support for deterministic compilation #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2580199 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet tool install --roll-forward` is remembered across uninstall #44818
  • Wrong System.Text.Json dependency in dotnet-watch #44811

Closed

  • NETSDK1221 warning for wpftmp.csproj projects #44605
  • 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' runs too late, and defines are missing when 'XamlPreCompile' runs, causing build failures #43908
  • [VCPKG] Visual Studio Preview 5 v17.12 caused SDK Resolver Failure on Microsoft.Build.Vcpkg #44664
  • The .NET SDK Warning NETSDK1214 is inconsistant between .NET 9.0 and .NET 8.0.40x SDKs #44006

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines" (#43011) #44832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove 6 from the branch codeflow #44829

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "[main] Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines (#43011) #44819
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #44825
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #44826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100 November 2024 Updates #44820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [9.0.2xx] Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2580625 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Remove the 9.0 template #44780
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44793

  • Dev 9611 #44676

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Method Contracts" #105
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties (VS 17.11, .NET 9) #6420
    13.0
  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • Proposal: never/bottom type #538
    Backlog
  • Champion "Type Classes (aka Concepts, Structural Generic Constraints)" #110
    Working Set
  • Champion "Null-conditional await" #35
    Any Time
  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297
    Backlog
  • Proposal: `tail return` recursive calls #2304
    Backlog
  • Champion: `base(T)` phase two #2337
    Backlog
  • Champion: Remove error "Cannot yield a value in the body of a try block with a catch clause" #2949
    Any Time
  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: inferred element type #8582
  • Note a possible ambiguity do to the new proposed betterness rule #8580

Merged

  • Add 'extending extensions' proposal #8577
  • Add open question about preferring ROS over Span #8574
  • Update dictionary-expressions.md #8579
  • Updates to Dictionary Expression spec #8568

Updated

  • CSharplang process updates #8578

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Large XML docs take up all quick info flyout space and (1) get clipped with no scrolling, and (2) hide all diagnostics #75877
    18.0
  • Extension method lookup results in unexpected behavior with OverloadResolutionPriority #75871
    17.13 P2
  • Extend the "Use collection expression" suggestion to scenarios requiring the spread operator #75870
    Backlog
  • Cannot create MetadataReference from WebCIL #75868
  • Convert to Generated RegEx mangles Constants #75866
  • Collection expr targeting Span type with spreads of unknown length performs unnecessary copies. #75863

Closed

  • Stack overflow due to struct layout cycle #66844
    Backlog
  • Formatting Bug for Simplify LINQ Expression #52283
    Backlog
  • File scoped namespaces should (arguably) be the default in VS code style settings for new users #72463
  • Intellisense Tooltip get too long in case of many generic parameters #5
    Backlog
  • NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateCSharpTemplateProjects is flakey #74157
  • The VBCSCompiler pipe name needs to normalize the path name #75714
    17.13
  • Consider preferring AddRange over CopyTo for collection-expressions of List type #71216
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't let inapplicable members participate in ORPA filtering #75878
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add embedded classification support for locals passed into an annotated api at a later point #75875
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Debugger update #75874
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove `getFieldSymbolToBeInitialized` #75872
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always sync text changes and active doc info to remote workspace #75864
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Merge main to VBOverloadResolutionPriority #75876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Create features/DictionaryExpression branch and resurrect parsing for those expressions #75846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update VSSDK versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix formatting of simplify-linq-expression #75860
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change tagging to free a SegmentedList back to a pool #75873
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support for running lightbulbs even when not fully loaded. #75869
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Make VBCSCompiler pipe name insensitive to casing of the path #75852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update structured logger #75865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move HasHome out of Binder #75851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow escaping refs to implicit rvalue temporaries #75830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Optimize single spread of IEnumerable to array #75847
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use `IsManagedType` for determining which state machine hoisted locals to clear #75841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Set MSBuild property 'GenerateDocumentationFile' to 'true' in project file to enable IDE0005 #58902
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, json #58894
  • Something strange with UserManager's users tracking #58892
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server - ObjectDisposedException with Scoped Services in Blazor Server During Disconnections #58887
  • Blazor NotFound route causes reload #58886
  • Support `connection_reset` with HTTP/1.1 #58885

Closed

  • Como Hackear Instagram com Segurança #58901
  • Blazor Explicit Rendering #58871
  • [Blazor] Define blazor.webassembly.Js as a static web asset #47640
  • [Blazor] Discourage use of `DotNet.invokeMethod` and `DotNet.invokeMethodAsync` #48396
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58889
  • Ability to check for JavaScript runtime support #49225
    .NET 10 Planning
  • NavigationException thrown in Static Server Render #55685
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Challenge or equivalent API to help with auth in interactive scenarios #58817
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor solution to loading data twice due to Prerender #58854
  • HybridCache cache not removed by tag #58857
  • Add camelCase option to the JSON console log formatter #58890
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, single_query #58876
  • Why does the page automatically redirect to "/Account/Login" when the user is not authorized? #58848

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #58900
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #58899
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #58898
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Mark API from 9 as shipped #58897
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix SignalR Java POM to include description #58896
    area-signalr, 9.0.x
  • Fix SignalR Java POM to include description #58895
    area-signalr
  • Nested Editor<T> Null Reference Exception. Fix a bug in the HtmlFieldPrefix.cs:23 #58888
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/2.3] Fix package for Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Razor.Design #58881
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • feat: analyzer and codeFix for kestrel setup `ListenOptions.Listen(IPAddress.Any)` usage #58872
    area-infrastructure, analyzer
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24560.6 #58862
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet-dump collect` -> EndOfStreamException; Process-being-dumped: "[createdump] Target process is alive" #5045

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable Publish a MacCatalyst app from Windows #25805
  • Full list of bugs and issues with new .NET 9 HybridWebView #25804
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Image and Font Failed to load on iPhone 15 plus which results to a white empty page #25796
  • Entry is autofocused in a Popup but the soft keyboard is not opened, also cannot be opened from code! #25793
  • Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #25792
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] D15_Step4 Pressing the Enter (arrow) key on the virtual keyboard does not complete the message and the label does not turn light blue. #25787
    Backlog
  • No way to catch permissions requests from new .NET 9 HybridWebView? Old method doesn't work anymore. #25784
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • FontImageSource Glyph becomes invisible intermittently on Android #25783
    Backlog
  • New HybridWebView .NET 9 functions to invoke Javascript - documentation, uncaught exceptions, forcing all Javascript to return JSON? #25782
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Fluent System design kit for MAUI #25645
  • [Discussion] Unfocus Android controls behavior vs accessibility #25688
  • [MAUI] Can't clear RadioButton Selection #25780
    Backlog
  • Touchscreen not working after rapidly touch .net maui hybrid app #25790
  • Touchscreen Functionality Crashing on Rapid Touch in .NET Maui Hybrid App #25791
    Backlog
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] After upgrading to 9.0 RC2, the game crashes at start both in Debug and Release configuration #25150
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Windows Build Errors #25132
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Hyper-V #25788
  • How to get the element's position of its parent element on iOS or Mac? #25797
  • Collection View Scrolling Not Smooth on iOS 18 (Version 8.0.92), While Versions 8.0.40 and iOS 17 Perform Smoothly #25369
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] After Navigating back the screen shows half of previous and half of the page before the previous page #25571
  • Error with Application.Current.Quit #25672
  • MeasureInvalided of the Parent is not being invoked when a Child invalidates itself #14706
    Backlog
  • Issue with TouchBehavior Background Color Remaining After Navigation in .NET MAUI (iOS 18) #25280
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • drawing text is not same as in winform with same font and font size? #25703

PullRequests

Created

  • Download using new APIs #25800
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Update Windows SDK projection for testing #25781
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 4 #25751
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 6 #25785
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Stable Branding for SR1 #25786

Updated

  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix issue with FilePicker for iOS apps running on Mac #25668
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Swipe view improvements #25233

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-ef - Could not load file or assembly 'ef, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' #35084
  • An error was generated for warning 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Migrations.PendingModelChangesWarning' When Updating DB (w/.NET9) #35080
  • Remove EFOptimizeContext #35079
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.NetTopologySuite ERROR: System.ArgumentException: shell is empty but holes are not #34981
  • Analyzer: Warn about missing indexes on queries #35026
  • Generate warning when new index on the same columns remove old one #35065
  • Cosmos: handle fake LeftJoins in query tree #33969
    9.0.0
  • Make it easy to add custom file header to generated code #10226
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35085

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #35083
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #35082
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #35081
  • Updating Cosmos version, including using new public APIs #35074
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35050

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35054
  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864
  • Move NonNullableConventionState to CoreAnnotationNames #35020
